creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: T-shaped; blue bottom panel with red edging on long sides; central woven design band in predominately red--patterned bands and stripes; thin stripes at bottom hem; applied vertical rectangular panel at center of similar woven motifs and colors, also edges on long sides in red; top panel is predominately cream and red, with geometric star designs woven at ends
title: Wrap-around skirt
